thread.title: OFFICIAL: Ashantigold to play in 2016 CAF Champions League
thread.title_full: OFFICIAL: Ashantigold to play in 2016 CAF Champions League

title: OFFICIAL: Ashantigold to play in 2016 CAF Champions League
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET OFFICIAL: Ashantigold to play in 2016 CAF Champions League Ashantigold 
Ghana Premier League champions Ashantigold will play in next year's CAF Champions League, the club has confirmed. 
The miners have been handed a massive financial warchest as they stage a return to Africa's elite inter-club competition. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
